__TOC__

* Event: Richard hosted a <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-us-wisconsin/1136/detail/|public outreach seminar]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[http://goo.gl/llQqb|flyer]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://i.imgur.com/I6o3W.jpg|newspaper announcement]]</nowiki>) on August 10 in Minocqua. Five locals showed up, several quite excited.

* Event: This month's <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-us-wisconsin/1085/detail/|Madison Ubuntu Hour]]</nowiki> was August 20. The next <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-us-wisconsin/1085/detail/|Madison Ubuntu Hour]]</nowiki> will be Sept 17. This event is on the third Saturday of each month, and is hosted by <nowiki>[[http://madisonlinux.org/|Madison LUG]]</nowiki>.

* <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/meetings/ubuntu-us-wisconsin/164/detail/|IRC monthly meeting August 10]]</nowiki>, 7:00 PM CDT. Discussed the possibility of starting more Ubuntu Hours around the state, events for the Ubuntu Global Bug Jam, and called for new wiki artwork.

* <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/meetings/ubuntu-us-wisconsin/172/detail/|IRC followup meeting August 17]]</nowiki>, 8:00 PM CDT for additional Global Jam planning. Upcoming <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/global/1011/detail/|Ubuntu Global Jam]]</nowiki> Events Sept 2-4:
* Sept 2: The first <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-us-wisconsin/1093/detail/|Milwaukee Ubuntu Hour]]</nowiki>. This event will be on first Friday of each month.
* Sept 3: IRC <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-us-wisconsin/1177/detail/|Brainstorm Triage Jam]]</nowiki>
* Sept 4: IRC <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-us-wisconsin/1178/detail/|Wisconsin Bug Jam]]</nowiki>

* We welcome new members. Join the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-us-Wisconsin|Launchpad Team]]</nowiki> and the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-wi|mailing list]]</nowiki>, and get involved!
